title: Don’t Stop the Loop! - Novel Updates
tags: Angels   Evil Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Oneshot   Otome Game   Personality Changes   Revenge   Second Chance   Time Loop   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Shakushi Neko   杓子ねこ
description:
The villainess Celestia didn't change her mind no matter how many times time looped back.

In every iteration, she bullied the heroine, resented the Crown Prince's condemnation, and summoned an evil dragon.

Hikariel, the angel who had always given Celestia mercy, is sobbing hysterically.

Will Celestia ever know true love and get out of the loop?>
